1.14.4.9.0.3: Fixed crash on forge 28.0.45, no longer works on forge prior to this version.

1.14.3.9.0.1: Fixed a crash on server side.
1.14.3.9.0.0: Initial port to 1.14.3, adds narration support to gui.

1.13.2.8.1.3: Removed debug print when pressing keys in the Torcherino GUI.
1.13.2.8.1.2: Complete redesign of the mod adding a GUI, custom user defined tiers (you will have to create assets), customizable speed and ranges and more.
1.13.2.8.0.1:
Changed how torcherinos affect random ticks (now dependant on speed of torcherino).
Added a config option to speed up the random tick amount given by torcherinos.
Added forge update check.
Moved lanterino's to the building blocks creative tab.
1.13.2.8.0.0:
Initial port of Torcherino to 1.13.2 using forge 25.0.42
Config options to disable compressed and double compressed torcherino's has temporarily been removed.
